content.description: Stand start and head straight up the slightly overhanging West side of this boulder. The rock quality is good. Descend the South or East side after topping out.
content.protection: There is a nice flat area at the bace of this problem for a crash pad.
content.location: This is located on the West aspect of this boulder.

content.description: This is the easiest line up and down this boulder. It is typically used as the descent after toping out on one of the other problems. Unfortunately, it has the worst rock quality on this boulder so be very carful what you step and pull on and don't trust anything.
content.protection: There is a nice flat area at the base for a crash pad.
content.location: this is on the south side of the boulder, nearest to the water.

content.description: Stand start and make use of the bulging features up the North side of this boulder. The rock quality is quite good. Descend the south or East side after topping out if you cant down climb this side.
content.protection: There is a nice flat area at the bace for a crash pad.
content.location: The North side of the boulder

content.description: This is the most central line up the East face of this boulder. The rock quality is great. It is a stand start and makes use of numerous small shelves. This can also be down climbed as the descent after toping out on this problem or any of the others.
content.protection: There is a nice flat area for a crash pad at the bace.
content.location: The East side of the boutlder
